subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Rangers entered Sunday afternoon’s game against the Penguins eyeing the top of the standings and left it — a 3-1 loss at Mellon Arena later — warily eyeing the bottom.
snippet: The Rangers entered Sunday afternoon’s game against the Penguins eyeing the top of the standings and left it — a 3-1 loss at Mellon Arena later — warily eyeing the bottom.
